name: Reject Poison
text: You are a careful poisoner, and know how to protect yourself against exposure to the ill effects of most substances.
prerequisites: Con 13, poison use class feature, worshiper of Norgorber.
benefit: Whenever you fail the initial saving throw against poison, you have a 20% chance of naturally rejecting the toxin, negating its effects and wasting its use.
prerequisites_zh: 体质13，用毒职业特性，信仰诺格巴。
benefit_zh: 每当你在对抗毒素的第一次豁免检定失败时，你将有20%直接抵抗掉毒素的效果，这剂毒药将被直接浪费掉。
